attributes.action: Look after this country before sending billions abroad to countries that don't need the help
attributes.additional_details:
The UK sends billions of pounds to countries with expanding economic wealth already.
Please divert the money back to this country to help those in need, ie those affected by the floods, those who are starving and needing food parcels, the people who have to chose to heat or eat.
There are hundreds of thousands of people in this country who need the help first.
The Government says they care about our people well here's your chance to step up and prove it.
